metadata.title: CVE-2018-10981 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.10.x allowing x86 HVM guest OSusers to cause a denial of service (host OS infinite loop) in situationswhere a QEMU device model attempts to make invalid transitions betweenstates of a request.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
